text: Ramon Reyes Jimenez Jr. (July 14, 1955 â€“ April 27, 2020) sometimes known as Monet or Mon Jimenez, was a Filipino advertising businessman and politician. He was Secretary of Tourism from 2011 to 2016 during the presidency of Benigno Aquino III.Tourism chief quits | The Manila Bulletin Newspaper Online He was born in Manila. Jimenez died on April 27, 2020 in Manila, aged 64. ==References== Category:Politicians from Manila Category:Businesspeople from Manila Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Ramon Jimenez Jr.
